Index.title: RealTWNOG
Index.subtitle: Taiwan Network Operators Group
Index.description: A community of network operators in Taiwan, working together to build a platform for network collaboration and tech sharing.
Index.mission_text: RealTWNOG wants to bring Taiwan's network operators together for tech sharing and teamwork, creating an open, collaborative community to boost network stability and security.
Index.whatWeDo_item3: Best Practices Chat for Network Infrastructure

Common.footer_description: A community of network operators in Taiwan, here to support network collaboration and tech sharing.

Events.title: Events
Events.subtitle: Come join our tech talks and sharing sessions
Events.description: Check out the tech conferences, workshops, and meetups RealTWNOG puts on—great chances to learn and grow with network pros.

About.title: About Us
About.description: Get to know RealTWNOG's mission and story
About.history_text: RealTWNOG kicked off in 2020, started by a bunch of engineers who love network infrastructure and wanted to create a local hub for network ops in Taiwan.
About.mission_text: We're here to spark tech sharing and teamwork among Taiwan's network operators, making networks better and safer.
About.value1_text: We think sharing knowledge helps the whole industry move forward.
About.value2_text: We're big on technical skills and love bringing top-notch content to the table.
About.value3_text: We encourage everyone to team up and tackle network challenges together.
About.history_2024: Turned into a key spot for network tech sharing in Taiwan and linked up with global network groups.
About.history_2025: Still pushing tech sharing and keeping ties with international network folks.
About.commitment_1: Sparking tech sharing and teamwork among network operators
About.commitment_2: Offering tips and resources for top-notch network practices
About.commitment_3: Building a network of pros in Taiwan's network scene
About.values_description: These ideas shape everything we do and help us support our community better.

Members.title: Our Members
Members.description: Meet the people and partners in our community
Members.benefit3: Be part of a pro network engineer crew
Members.benefit4: Make industry connections and team-up chances
Members.join_discord: Hop into our Discord community to learn more about signing up.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: Got questions or ideas? We'd love to hear from you
Contact.name: Name
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.faq1_answer: Most events are free. Some special workshops or conferences might have a small fee, but members usually get a discount.
Contact.faq2_question: How do I become a speaker or share something?
Contact.faq2_answer: Hit us up through this form or on Discord with your topic idea and outline.
